channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local

item.title: CVE-2020-4367|2024-08-04T08:00:07.388Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 179001.

item.title: CVE-2020-4985|2024-08-04T08:22:08.516Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 could allow an attacker to obtain sensitive information due to accepting body parameters in a query. IBM X-Force ID: 192642.

item.title: CVE-2019-4134|2024-08-04T19:26:28.018Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 158281.

item.title: CVE-2020-4503|2024-08-04T08:07:48.878Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 182283.

item.title: CVE-2020-4669|2024-08-04T08:07:49.160Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 connects to a MongoDB server. MongoDB, a document-oriented database system, is listening on the remote port, and it is configured to allow connections without password authentication. A remote attacker can gain unauthorized access to the database. IBM X-Force ID: 184600.

item.title: CVE-2020-4360|2024-08-04T08:00:07.175Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178765.

item.title: CVE-2020-4366|2024-08-04T08:00:07.656Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 178965.

item.title: CVE-2020-4306|2024-08-04T08:00:06.936Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0.0 through 2.0.9 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 176735.

item.title: CVE-2020-4649|2024-08-04T08:07:49.159Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0.9.2 and IBM Planning Analytics Workspace 57 could expose data to non-privleged users by not invalidating TM1Web user sessions. IBM X-Force ID: 186022.

item.title: CVE-2020-4431|2024-08-04T08:07:47.620Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 180761.

item.title: CVE-2020-4670|2024-08-04T08:07:49.195Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 connects to a Redis server. The Redis server, an in-memory data structure store, running on the remote host is not protected by password authentication. A remote attacker can exploit this to gain unauthorized access to the server. IBM X-Force ID: 186401.

item.title: CVE-2024-35143|2024-08-04T13:03:10.154Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 connects to a MongoDB server. MongoDB, a document-oriented database system, is listening on the remote port, and it is configured to allow connections without password authentication. A remote attacker can gain unauthorized access to the database. IBM X-Force ID: 292420.

item.title: CVE-2024-31908|2024-08-02T01:59:50.538Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289890.
